name: European Milk Board
goal:
The European Milk Board lobbies for milk producers in Europe. The Board has members in 15 European countries and represents about 100,000 milk producers. We stand for a forward-looking, sustainable milk production in every region of Europe that enables farmers to earn a decent living from their labour.
The basic prerequisite for this is a milk price that covers the average milk production costs.
euInitiatives:
CAP reform
EU initiatives against unfair trading practices
Future Free Trade Agreements
